title: Ticket #6122: collector should record what authn method was used to update ads
description:
Upon receiving an ad, the collector already inserts the AuthenticatedIdentity of the entity sending the ad. This will also cause it to insert the method used to ascertain that identity.

While technically not a bug, this is going in the stable series because some future bug fixes in the stable series might need to reference it.
remarks:
2017-Mar-01 12:37:37 by tim:
CODE REVIEW: Needs to delete the AuthencationMethod when not Authenticated, otherwise the code is fine.
check_ins:
2017-Mar-01 11:45   Check-in [50242]: Documention for #6122. Also, delete AuthenticationMethod when deleting AuthenticatedIdentity (By Tim Theisen )
2017-Feb-01 14:59   Check-in [50094]: Have the collector insert the authentication method used to send the ad. Will be UNDEFINED if no authn was performed. #6122 (By zmiller )
creator: zmiller
